howToPublish.question: How do I publish a listing?
howToPublish.answer: Tap the '+' button in the bottom navigation, select your listing type (vehicle, part, or service), fill in the details, add photos, and tap 'Publish Listing'.

howToContact.question: How do I contact a seller?
howToContact.answer: Open any listing and tap the 'Message' button to start a conversation with the seller. You'll need to be signed in to send messages.

howToFavorite.question: How do I save listings to favorites?
howToFavorite.answer: Tap the heart icon on any listing card to save it to your favorites. Access your saved listings from the 'Favorites' tab in the bottom navigation.

howToEditListing.question: How do I edit or delete my listing?
howToEditListing.answer: Go to your listing detail page, tap the edit icon in the header. From there you can update details or delete the listing entirely.

howToDeleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
howToDeleteAccount.answer: Go to Profile → Security & Privacy → Delete Account. You'll need to type 'DELETE' to confirm. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

safetyTips.question: What are some safety tips for buying/selling?
safetyTips.answer: Meet in public places, bring someone with you, inspect items before paying, use secure payment methods, and trust your instincts. Report suspicious listings.

home.title: CarNetworx - Buy & Sell Vehicles, Parts & Services Near You
home.description: Find vehicles, auto parts, and automotive services near you. Browse listings, contact sellers, and discover trusted mechanics and car washes in your area.
